name: commit-timesheet-helper
description: View grouped commits and copy daily summaries for timesheets inside VS Code.

scripts.package:patch: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version && npm run package:local

commitTimesheet.daysBack.description: How many days back to fetch commits (uses git --since).

commitTimesheet.author.description: Optional git author filter. If null, falls back to `git config user.name`.
